text:
Champions League
BarÃ§a - Slavia Prague: towards a package of LuÃ­s Suarez?
Released in the 41st minute against Levante (3-1) due to muscle strain right calf, LuÃ­s Suarez could be away from the ground for 3 weeks.
02 Nov 2019, 22:20 by Charlie Creteur



The Blaugrana suffered a double blow on the outside against Levante! In addition to conceding defeat in the second half (3-1), FC Barcelona saw Uruguayan striker LuÃ­s Suarez, who was injured in the 41st minute. The latter felt a muscle discomfort after receiving a blow to the right calf, a few days of the second confrontation against Slavia Prague in the Champions League.




Injured for 3 weeks?




LuÃ­s Suarez would be back against LeganÃ©s (23 November) +8 ğŸ“·Credit Photo - Icon Sport

According to the daily AS, the injury of the former resident of Liverpool could be more serious. Indeed, El Pistolero could be away from the field for 3 weeks and miss the meeting against Slavia Prague (November 05) but also against Celta Vigo (November 09). The statement issued by BarÃ§a in the evening is not reassuring either ...
